title: Loop-free graphs
content: For a hypergraph, the property to be "loop-free" is expressed by ` I : dom I --> E ` with ` E = { x e. ~P V | 2 <_ ( # `` x ) } ` and ` I = ( iEdg `` G ) `. ` E ` is the set of edges which connect at least two vertices.

blocks.name: umgrislfupgrlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ umgrislfupgr and ~ usgrislfuspgr . (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgrislfupgrlem(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))
} = {
  3eqtri(cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wa(wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  ineq2i(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  ax-mp(wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  rabbidva2(s0, cpw(c0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  impbid1(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  ex(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  jca(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  simprl(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  pm2.61ine(cv(s0), emptycls, wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  impcomd(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantld(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wbr(nat2, cle, nat0))
  breq2d(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  syl6eq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0, cfv(chash, emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(s0), emptycls, chash)
  hash0()
  sylbi(wbr(nat2, cle, nat0), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2)))
  lenlti(nat2, nat0)
  0re()
  pm2.21(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  ax-1(wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), cpw(c0), emptycls)
  simprr(wbr(nat0, clt, nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)))
  eldifi(cv(s0), cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))
  inrab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  rabbii(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wa(wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))
  bicomi(wa(wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wa(wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cxr), wcel(nat2, cxr))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cxr), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cxnn0))
  elv(s0, wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cxnn0))
  hashxnn0(cv(s0), universe)
  xnn0xr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)))
  rexri(nat2)
  2re()
  xrletri3(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, clt, nat2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: umgrislfupgr
blocks.content: A multigraph is a loop-free pseudograph. (Contributed by AV, 27-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgrislfupgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cumgr), wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cumgr), wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  umgrupgr(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  umgrf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  fssd(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  id(wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  a1i(wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  ss2rabi(s0, cpw(c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  mpbird(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wbr(nat2, cle, nat2))
  a1i(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, nat2))
  leidi(nat2)
  2re()
  breq2(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2, nat2, cle)
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  upgrf(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  sylbb1(wa(wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))))
  fin(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wf(c1, cdm(c1), cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))), wceq(cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  umgrislfupgrlem(s0, c2)
  feq3(cin(crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), c1, cdm(c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cupgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(c1, cdm(c1), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
  isumgr(s0, c0, cupgr, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: lfgredgge2
blocks.content: An edge of a loop-free graph has at least two ends. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lfgredgge2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3)))), wceq(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3)))), wceq(c1, cdm(c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  syl(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3))), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  ffvelrnda(c3, c1, c0, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wf(c0, c1, c2))
  biimpi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  feq23i(c0, c1, c2, c1, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(c1)
  simprbi(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3))), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cpw(c5)))
  elrab2(hs0, cfv(c0, c3), crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))))
  breq2d(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c3)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, c3), chash)
  cbvrabv(s0, hs0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(hs0))))
  breq2d(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), chash)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c5))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, c3))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c5)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)))
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, cv(hs0))
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
}

blocks.name: lfgrnloop
blocks.content: A loop-free graph has no loops. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm lfgrnloop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crab(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3))), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crab(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3))), emptycls)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  sylibr(wf(c0, c1, c2), wceq(crab(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3))), emptycls), wral(s0, c1, wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3)))))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3))))
  nff(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfcxfr(s0, c2, crab(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  nfrab1(s0, cpw(c5), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  ex(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3))))
  nsyl3(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mtbiri(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, csn(c3))))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, csn(c3)))), wo(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat1)))
  hashsn01(c3)
  jaoi(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat0), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat1), wn(wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, csn(c3)))))
  mtbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat0), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), wbr(nat2, cle, nat0))
  mpbi(wn(wbr(nat2, cle, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  ltnlei(nat0, nat2)
  0re()
  breq2(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat0, nat2, cle)
  mtbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat1), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, csn(c3))), wbr(nat2, cle, nat1))
  mpbi(wn(wbr(nat2, cle, nat1)), wbr(nat1, clt, nat2))
  1lt2()
  ltnlei(nat1, nat2)
  1re()
  2re()
  breq2(cfv(chash, csn(c3)), nat1, nat2, cle)
  breq2d(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cfv(chash, csn(c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3)))
  fveq2(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3), chash)
  lfgredgge2(s0, c0, c1, c2, cv(s0), c4, c5)
  rabeq0(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c3)))
}
